name: Grimaldi Studio legale
goal:
The firm has comprehensive and specific experience in European Community law, public law, antitrust law, transportation law, liberalisation procedures, mergers and acquisition transactions, and structured finance

The firm has a deep competence in state aid matters and public procurement, as well as on structural funds and other European financial measures.
The firm assists clients before the Italian and European Courts with antitrust and EU matters with regard to all industry sectors.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, External Relations, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: The firm is currently following EU initiatives on: capital market union, EFSI, data protection, financial services, consumer protection.
